results.title: Simvastatin attenuated cerebrovascular cell proliferation in the development of hypertension through Rho/Rho-kinase pathway.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ attenuated @GENE_EDN1 @GENE_24323 @@@ET-1@@@-induced proliferation through the Rho/Rho-kinase signaling pathway in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ basilar artery, and it may be an excellent reagent to protect @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@vascular remodeling@@@ and @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@.

citations.NLM: Ma MM, Li SY, Wang M, Guan YY. Simvastatin attenuated cerebrovascular cell proliferation in the development of hypertension through Rho/Rho-kinase pathway. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2012 Jun;59(6):576-82. PMID: 22392066

results.journal: Am J Respir Crit Care Med

results.title: Simvastatin prevents and reverses chronic pulmonary hypertension in newborn rats via pleiotropic inhibition of RhoA signaling.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol
results.text_hl: Preventive or rescue treatment of chronic @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@-exposed animals with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ decreased pulmonary vascular resistance, @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@right ventricular hypertrophy@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary arterial remodeling@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin Restores Down-Regulated GATA-6 Expression in Pulmonary Hypertensive Rats
results.text_hl: The male Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ model was established with receiving pneumonectomy and @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@monocrotaline@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@) administration. Right @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary artery remodeling@@@ in these animals was compared with untreated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ or @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Fluvastatin inhibits hypoxic proliferation and p38 MAPK activity in pulmonary artery fibroblasts.
results.journal: Am J Respir Cell Mol Biol
results.text_hl: This fibroproliferative response occurs in acute and chronic @DISEASE_Hypoxia_Brain @DISEASE_MESH:D002534 @@@hypoxic@@@ models, is dependent on p38 mitogen-activated protein (MAP) kinase activation, is selective for the pulmonary circulation, and would seem an important therapeutic target. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary vascular remodeling@@@ in animal models, but additional information regarding mechanisms of action, differential antiproliferative effects and dose responses of available statins is required for appropriate clinical trial design.

citations.NLM: Carlin CM, Peacock AJ, Welsh DJ. Fluvastatin inhibits hypoxic proliferation and p38 MAPK activity in pulmonary artery fibroblasts. Am J Respir Cell Mol Biol. 2007 Oct;37(4):447-56. PMID: 17556673
